title: i cant find a match
body:
It all started this morning when i wanted to play normals but i cant find a match. then later i got a warning say you have already decline too many recent active games or something and wants me to wait for 20 seconds or 15 seconds before i can queue. but the thing is i never get a match. the your game is ready accept button does not show for me. it doesnt show anything until it shows you have decline games and have to wait. i also cant join my friends lobby. he already invited my so many times and i still didnt got the invitation and he say that i already decline the invitation even tough i didnt do anything. so i wanted to play rank and then i wait for around 5 minutes and the same thing happened. i got no matches and i got the warning you have decline too many matches. and now i have to wait 25 minutes before queue again because of i decline matches. i think that the lol launcher is lagging for me because in game when i play with bots its totally fine but its something wrong with the internet and finding matches. and also they dont give the accept the match button
anyone can help me?

replies.body: can somebody help pls i am unable to play even 1 game today
